keyword: calories in a cup of carrots
title: Calories in a Cup of Carrots
meta_description: Discover calories in a cup of carrots, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: Calories in a Cup of Carrots
assumptions: Raw, sliced carrots; 1 cup â‰ˆ128 g; no added dressings or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by carrot size, variety, freshness, preparation, and measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of sliced raw carrots provides ~52 kcal and ~3.6 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of raw carrots?
faqs.a: About 52 kcal for 1 cup sliced raw carrots.

faqs.q: What is the fiber content in a cup of carrots?
faqs.a: Approximately 3.6 g of dietary fiber per cup.
Yes, 1 cup has ~12.3 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

faqs.q: Do cooked carrots have more calories than raw?
faqs.a: No, boiled carrots have similar or slightly fewer calories (~50 kcal per cup).

faqs.q: How much protein in a cup of carrots?
faqs.a: Only about 1.2 g protein per cup; carrots are low in protein.
